title: How to Become a Loving and Caring Pokemon Trainer with Your Plush

steps.headline: Start out by getting your first (or second) Pokémon plush.
steps.description: This will be your companion for the rest of your journey. You should make sure you will love them forever. So choose a plush (Pokémon character) you like.

steps.headline: Nicknames are important!
steps.description: Because that is what your Pokémon will go by! It may be determined by gender, but some Pokémon don't have genders, so choose something that fits them best!

steps.headline: Make your trainer name!
steps.description: That is what your Pokémon will call you!

steps.headline: Find a secret place that pets and siblings can't get to, for this will be your Pokémon's home.
Get a pillow and a light blanket.
steps.description: The pillow will be the mattress, and the blanket will keep them warm!

steps.headline: Get some fake food to feed your plush.
steps.description:
such as:
Clay Poffins, Pokeblocks, berries and Pokepuffs. Doll food

steps.headline: You can spoon feed it to your plush.
Have fun together!
steps.description: Go to parks! Take it every place you can! When you can't, wait until you can go back home and have some extra fun.

steps.headline: Have sleepovers.
steps.description: It's fun and you can invite your friends and socialize.

text:
Making it Real Start out by getting your first (or second) Pokémon plush. This will be your companion for the rest of your journey. You should make sure you will love them forever. So choose a plush (Pokémon character) you like. Nicknames are important! Because that is what your Pokémon will go by! It may be determined by gender, but some Pokémon don't have genders, so choose something that fits them best! Make your trainer name! That is what your Pokémon will call you! Making a Home Find a secret place that pets and siblings can't get to, for this will be your Pokémon's home.  Get a pillow and a light blanket. The pillow will be the mattress, and the blanket will keep them warm! Food Get some fake food to feed your plush. such as:
Clay Poffins, Pokeblocks, berries and Pokepuffs. Doll food You can spoon feed it to your plush.  Bonding Have fun together! Go to parks! Take it every place you can! When you can't, wait until you can go back home and have some extra fun. Have sleepovers. It's fun and you can invite your friends and socialize.
